LoginPage.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

LoginPage.requiredOtp: The OTP code with 6 digits is required

SubscriptionDetails.title: Subscription Details
SubscriptionDetails.subTitle: View the details of the subscription
SubscriptionDetails.name: Name
SubscriptionDetails.cancelSubscriptionDescription: Please choose how you would like to cancel this subscription:
SubscriptionDetails.cancelAtPeriodEndDescription: This subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing period.
SubscriptionDetails.cancelNowWithRemainingRefund: Cancel Now & Get Remaining Period Refund
SubscriptionDetails.cancelNowWithRemainingRefundDescription: This subscription will be canceled immediately and the customer will receive a refund for the remaining days of the current period.
SubscriptionDetails.cancelNowWithFullRefundDescription: This subscription will be canceled immediately and the customer will receive a full refund for the current period.
SubscriptionDetails.cancelNowWithoutRefundDescription: This subscription will be canceled immediately without any refund.
SubscriptionDetails.cancelAtPeriodEndDescription2: Your subscription will already be canceled at the end of the current period. If you are not sure about this, please contact our support team.
SubscriptionDetails.updateError: An error occured while updating your subscription
SubscriptionDetails.invoiceNotFound: An error occured while fetching your invoice
SubscriptionDetails.preCanceledDescription: This subscription was canceled and will be stop at the end of the current period.

Email.farewellMessage: We wish you an excellent day!
Email.noReplyEmail: This email was sent from an unmonitored email address. Please do not reply to this email. If you have any questions, please contact us at {email}
Email.companyMessage: We wish you an excellent day!
Email.userMessage: I wish you an excellent day!
Email.otpMessage1: You are receiving this email because you requested a one-time password (OTP) for your account.
Email.otpMessage3: Please do not share this code with anyone. We will never ask for it. If you didn't request this code, please ignore this email.
Email.otpMessageTiming: This code will expire in 5 minutes.
Email.otpWarningMessage: Please do not share this code with anyone. We will never ask for it. If you didn't request this code, please ignore this email.
Email.confirmEmailMessage: To confirm your email address, and activate your account, click the button below or copy and paste the link into your browser.
Email.resetEmailMessage: To reset your password, click the button below and follow the instructions. This link will expire in 1 hour. If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email or contact our support team.

Support.newMessage: You've received a new message in one of your conversations with our customer support team. Here is a summary:

ProductPage.title: Our products
ProductPage.error: An error occurred while fetching products, please try again
ProductPage.noResults: Oh no! We can't find any products for your search. Try again with another keyword.

Front.errorFrontTitle: An error occurred, please try again later or contact support team

Cart.loginToProceed: Login to your account to access your personal cart
Cart.MixedProductTypes: Please separate your orders for different products.
Cart.MixedProductTypesSubtitle: You can't checkout with mixed product types. Please separate different subscription and on time buy product.
Cart.failToCheckout: There was an error while checking out, please try again.
Cart.cantCheckout: You can't checkout for the moment, please review your cart or account.
Cart.UserProfileIncompleteSubtitle: Please complete your profile on your account page to proceed to checkout.
Cart.UserProfileIncomplete: Your profile is incomplete, some fields are missing.
Cart.VoucherNotActiveSubtitle: The voucher applied to your cart is expired or not available for your order, please remove to proceed to checkout.
Cart.mixedProductTypes: Please separate your orders for different products.
Cart.mixedProductTypesSubtitle: You can't checkout with mixed product types. Please separate different subscription and on time buy product.
Cart.userProfileIncomplete: Your profile is incomplete, some fields are missing.
Cart.productNotActiveSubtitle: Please remove the product that is not available to proceed to checkout.
Cart.userProfileIncompleteSubtitle: Please complete your profile on your account page to proceed to checkout.
Cart.voucherNotActiveSubtitle: The voucher applied to your cart is expired or not available for your order, please remove to proceed to checkout.
Cart.checkoutDescription: When clicking on checkout, you accept ou terms and conditions. Prices are provided as information only and the final price will be confirmed at the end of the checkout process.

Checkout.redirectingToCheckout: We are processing your payment, please wait...
Checkout.redirectingToCheckoutMessage: Mmm, it seems like the process is taking longer than expected. Please wait a few seconds and then click the button below to go to your orders page
Checkout.redirectingMessage: When the process is finished, you will be automatically redirected to your order information.
Checkout.orderSuccessMessage: We're excited to confirm that your order has been successfully placed. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly.

MyOrder.title: I have a question about my orders
MyOrder.question: What do you want to know about your orders ?

Questions.missing: I can't find my order in my account.
Questions.delay: When will my order be processed?
Questions.question: I have a question about my recent order.
Questions.cancel: I would like to cancel my order.
Questions.refund: How can I get a refund for my order?

Responses.missing: Please make sure you're logged in and check the order history tab.
Responses.delay: Orders are usually processed within 24 to 48 hours.
Responses.question: Sure! Could you please specify your question about your order?
Responses.cancel: You can cancel your order from your dashboard if it's still in processing.
Responses.refund: Refunds are issued within 5-7 days after approval.

Subscriptions.title: I have a question about my subscriptions
Subscriptions.question: What do you want to know about your subscriptions ?

Questions.where: Where can I find my subscription?
Questions.how: How does the subscription system work?
Questions.question: I have a question about my subscription.
Questions.cancel: I would like to cancel my subscription.
Questions.refund: How can I request a refund for my subscription?

Responses.where: Your subscription details are available in your account under the Subscriptions tab.
Responses.how: Subscriptions renew automatically monthly or annually, depending on your plan.
Responses.question: Sure, let me know what you'd like to know about your subscription.
Responses.cancel: You can cancel your subscription anytime in your account settings.
Responses.refund: Refunds for subscriptions depend on the terms and time of cancellation.

Shop.title: I have a question about the shop
Shop.question: What do you want to know about our shop ?

Questions.difference: What's the difference between one-time purchase and subscription?
Questions.pay: How do I make a payment?
Questions.product: I have a question about a product.
Questions.negociate: Can I negotiate the price of a product?
Questions.voucher: How can I use a discount or voucher code?

Responses.difference: One-time purchases are charged once, subscriptions renew automatically.
Responses.pay: You can pay using your preferred method at checkout.
Responses.methods: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and more depending on your region.
Responses.product: Sure! Let me know which product you're interested in.
Responses.negociate: For bulk or B2B orders, feel free to contact our sales team.
Responses.voucher: You can enter your voucher code during checkout to apply a discount.

CustomerService.title: I have a question about customer service
CustomerService.question: What do you want to know about our customer service and/or your support ?

Questions.legal: Where can I read the legal terms and conditions?
Questions.contact: How do I contact customer service?
Questions.tickets: How can I view my support tickets?
Questions.human: I want to speak to a human agent.

Responses.legal: You can find all our legal and policy documents in the footer of the website.
Responses.contact: You can reach customer support through the contact form or live chat.
Responses.tickets: Your support tickets are available in your user dashboard.
Responses.human: Sure! A human agent will join the conversation shortly.

Account.title: I have a question about my account
Account.question: What do you want to know about your account ?

Questions.create: How do I create an account?
Questions.confirm: How do I confirm my email address?
Questions.reset: I forgot my password, how can I reset it?
Questions.blocked: My account has been blocked, what should I do?

Responses.create: Click on 'Sign Up' and fill in your details to create an account.
Responses.confirm: We sent you a confirmation email. Click the link inside to verify your address.
Responses.reset: Click 'Forgot password?' on the login page to reset your credentials.
Responses.blocked: Please contact support to resolve issues with your account.
